May 24, 1904 D Nottingham Contest
Nottingham Contest 0 Other
nottingham-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Ruddington Hall Park, Nottingham 1st day of contests at the Notts Agricultural Show Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £12 and trombone, 3rd £5, 4th £3, 5th £2. Waltz contest: 1. Rushden Temperance, 2. Hucknall, 3. Kettering Town Best euphonium - Irwell Bank. Best cornet - Hucknall Temperance. 6 bands competed.
May 18, 2017, 8:49 a.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 9:25 a.m.
1 Lea Mills Alexander Owen Lortzing
2 Irwell Bank Alexander Owen Lortzing
3 Hucknall Excelsior Alexander Owen Mercadante
4 Kettering Rifles Alexander Owen Mercadante
5 Kettering Town Silver Band Randolph Ryan Mercadante
6 Rushden Windmill Band Alexander Owen Mercadante
